settings.title: Master the Mental Game of Elite Performance

settings.editor: Elite mental skills coaching for champions in sport and beyond. Unlock your championship potential by training the most important muscle > your mind.

Unlike conventional sports psychology, our comprehensive approach trains all mental dimensions of performance. Just as elite training develops strength, endurance, skills, tactics, and strategy on the field, we develop your mind across those same dimensions.
Build unshakeable resilience and composure under pressure. Train your mind to thrive in adversity.
Develop mental endurance to maintain focus and intensity throughout preseason, competition and seasons.
Master specific developmental cognitive skills like visualisation, self-talk strategies, and mental routines.
Enhance real-time decision-making, situational awareness, perspective awareness, and adaptability under pressure.
Align daily habits (1% incremental gains) and team culture with overarching objectives, strategy and vision for sustained excellence.

settings.text: Check out our Mental Skills Framework

settings.editor: Each service targets a different segment of the sports performance ecosystem, delivering personalized mental skills training for maximum impact.

Personal mental coaching for athletes who want to elevate their game by training the mind as intentionally as they train the body. Break through mental barriers and build unshakeable confidence under pressure.

Strengthen the collective mental fortitude and culture of your team. Develop shared mental frameworks for success, from creating accountability and trust to training unified responses to high-pressure situations.

Specialised coaching for support staff and coaching personnel to enhance their mental skills and leadership impact. Help your performance staff model mental toughness and communicate effectively with athletes.
Executive-style coaching for head coaches in elite sport. Refine your leadership mindset, communication, and emotional intelligence to lead your team to championships.
Our proven track record speaks for itself. The same mental coaching trusted by Olympic champions and world-class athletes is available to elevate your performance.
Fiji Rugby 7s - Gold 2021, Silver 2024
From Olympic level to emerging talent
Elite mental performance coaching

Mental Performance Coach to Fiji Rugby 7s during their historic Olympic triumphs.

Faced with unprecedented challenges including pandemic isolation and intense pressure as defending champions, the team's mental resilience became a decisive advantage.
From Formula 1 drivers to Olympic teams, elite performers choose Head Coach for the mental edge that makes the difference.
Red Bull, Williams and Invicta Racing for drivers, performance and corporate staff. Mental coaching for the high-stakes world of motorsport, maintaining confidence through racing's extreme pressures.

Mental skills coach for world featherweight contender Michael Conlan From amateur ranks in boxing to professional title fights, sharpening mental approach for handling pressure and bouncing back from setbacks.

Fiji Rugby 7s (Men and Women), Hong Kong China Women's Rugby 7s, Fijiana Rugby XVs, NSW Waratahs (Super Rugby), Queensland Firebirds (Netball), and Rugby Australia programs. Cultural shifts and mental resilience training for championship-level performance.
Our methods have proven effective for training mental resilience in elite coaches under pressure conditions.

Head Coach offers a developmental coaching approach that goes far beyond conventional sports psychology. We don't just address problems when they arise – we proactively train all mental dimensions of performance.

image.alt: Table illustrating keyu differences between traditional sports psychology and the Intergral+ elite model

settings.editor: We look at things not from a psychology perspective, but from a developmental perspective. It's about growing the human being on the inside to unleash their potential on the outside.

settings.text: Learn more about our framework for mental skills

settings.editor: Co-founder of The Coaching Room and creator of the Integral+ High-Performance Model. Jay brings over 20 years of elite mental performance coaching, combining advanced methodologies like NLP, Integral Psychology and cognitive sciences with proven championship results.

image.alt: Image of Jay Hedley facing camera

settings.editor:
Jay's Integral+ approach recognises that elite performance emerges from development across multiple dimensions simultaneously. Beyond mental skills training, this methodology maps the whole performer, tracking vertical stage of development (from reactive to self-authoring), horizontal state access (from gross awareness to flow and peak states), multiple lines of intelligence (cognitive, emotional, somatic, moral), personality structure (Enneagram patterns and Identity Compass), and shadow integration (unconscious limiting beliefs and blind spots).

Athletes don't just "wake up, clean up, and show up" – they evolve through progressive stages of complexity within their thinking and decision making under pressure, developing multiple intelligences at different rates, by understanding their typology patterns, and integrating their blindspots.

This whole-person methodology addressed within all 4 human perspectives (available to us today): interior individual (mindset, beliefs), exterior individual (physiology, skills, technique), interior collective (team culture, shared values), and exterior collective (systems, structures, strategy and environment), rather than just pulling levers with performance symptoms.

Elite Credentials & Proven Results

Olympic Excellence: Gold Medal (Tokyo 2021) & Silver Medal (Paris 2024) - Fiji Rugby 7s
World Championship Impact: Rugby World Cup 2025 - Fijiana Women's XV (England)
Professional Pathways: Super Rugby (2018/19 NSW Waratahs) | Super Netball (2022 Qld Firebirds) | Professional Boxing (Michael Conlan 2023-2026 WCB)
Elite Performance: Formula 1/Formula 2 teams and Drivers: Red Bull Racing Williams F1, Invicta F2

Foundational Mastery

  • Meta Coaching Foundation (MCF) Certified Professional Coach (Associate Certified Meta Coach)
  • NLP Trainer (International Society for Neuro Semantics)
  • Neuro-Semantics Specialist
  • Founder of The Coaching Room Australia
  • 20+ years elite coaching experience across Olympic, professional, and international competition

Unlike run-of-the-mill sports psychology, Jay's Integral model systematically trains mental strength, conditioning, technique, tactics, and strategy. This comprehensive framework has been championship-proven at the highest levels of sport.

Co-founder of The Coaching Room and creator of the Integral+ High-Performance Model. Jay brings over 20 years of elite mental performance coaching, combining advanced methodologies like NLP, Integral Psychology and cognitive sciences with proven championship results.

With over 25 years in professional sport, John Dams has dedicated his career to understanding what drives world-class performance. Having worked across three countries as a Strength Coach and Performance Manager, John has been part of multiple championship-winning teams, helping athletes and organizations reach the highest levels of success.

Over the course of his career, John has worked with hundreds of world-class athletes, coaches, and teams, embedding high-performance principles that drive consistent excellence at every level.

Transitioning from elite sport into technology and strategy, John now leads the Asia-Pacific region for a global sports analytics company, partnering with professional teams and governing bodies to design and implement data-led systems that turn information into action.

Retrained as a Developmental and Executive Coach, John has designed and delivered programs for finance professionals (traders), product managers, software engineers, and leadership teams — translating elite-sport frameworks into sustainable results in business and life.

John’s approach is grounded in experience—not theory. Having worked alongside some of the world’s best coaches, teams, and leaders, he understands world-class processes at every level of the performance business. He blends the discipline and structure of elite sport with the strategic, human dimensions of modern leadership — helping people build clarity, consistency, and sustained success.

“I’ve seen what world-class looks like, and my mission is to help people access that level in their own environment—whether that’s in sport, business, or life.”
— John Dams

slides.content: "We've been fortunate to work with Jay over the past few years across our National Rugby Union teams, including those that competed at the Olympics and Rugby World Cup. His expertise, professionalism, and commitment have had a significant impact—particularly during the Rugby World Cup, where his contribution was invaluable. Highly recommend."
slides.name: Alana Thomas
slides.title: High Performance Manager, Fiji Womens Rugby

slides.content:
"Life Changing Experience: Personally and Professionally
Completing the High-Performance Mindset Coaching (MST) has been nothing short of transformational. The program hasn't just changed my life—it's expanded how I show up for others.
As a semi professional Basketball coach, culture leader, and mentor, I've now been able to deeply impact athletes, teams, and professionals by helping them move limiting beliefs, master self-talk, and unlock peak performance through the tools and awareness I've developed here. The ripple effect of this training is massive, from high-level sport to everyday conversations, I'm seeing real change happen.
Thank you for everything - I'm truly grateful."
slides.name: Andrew Cipriano
slides.title: Semi-Professional Basketball Coach

slides.content: As a trainer of 29 years, you're never old or late to improve your coaching skills. Ever since COVID, I've been on the path of self improvement and development. For any new inspiring or experience trainer/coach I strongly recommend the High Performance Mental Skills Program. The use of the models in the program was a game changer for me. It opened my eyes to how I can better communicate and motivate with my clients / athletes. I've already noticed a difference how I communicate with my U12's football side. As I'm dealing with a wide variety of personalities and spectrums of children. I would to thank Jay and Tarek, who are some of best in there field in regards to Human Performance."
slides.name: David Smethurst
slides.title: Fitness Coach (PT)

slides.content: "Jay and the team have played a huge part in my development and growth as a professional rugby union coach. I have been working with Jay for 6 years, across the Fiji Rugby Olympic 7s campaign, multiple Super Rugby Pacific seasons and the 2023 Rugby World Cup. I look forward to his guidance, expertise and more importantly his mentorship into the future."
slides.name: Brad Harris
slides.title: Defence Coach, Western Force Super Rugby Team

slides.content: "Jay has been a helpful resource in developing my mental skills as a professional athlete. He is really good at looking at situations with objectivity and has helped me develop a framework to do the same. I’d recommend him for anyone looking to get some new perspective and develop strategies to deal with things you’re struggling with!"
slides.name: Jessica Ho
slides.title: Professional Rugby Player Hong Kong China Rugby

slides.content: ""The Mental Skills Training Program is highly recommended. Brilliant insights and learning, invaluable for my practice as a coach."
slides.name: Liam Hogan
slides.title: Performance Coach & Physiotherapist Williams Racing

slides.content: "I am now in to my 4th year of working with Jay and am so grateful for their continued support in my professional Rugby Coaching journey."
slides.name: Gareth Baber
slides.title: Head Coach Nissa Rugby France (Ex Fiji Rugby 7s Coach)

slides.content: "The Coaching Room gift you a perspective you will not have been aware of before. They then help you with the courage to use it wisely. If you want to want shake life up a bit and see what's possible, look no further."
slides.name: Jake Aliker
slides.title: Force and Grace (Ex Coach to Max Verstapen Red Bull Racing)

slides.content: "I've been working with Jay for a couple of years now as an athlete, and I'm extremely grateful for what we've achieved in such a short period of time. During the sessions he takes me outside my comfort zone to challenge and question my mindset, and he doesn't let me avoid accountability. His coaching has helped to reduce my anxiety around competing and performance and allowed me to focus on doing what I love."
slides.name: Madeleine Bowen
slides.title: Australian Champion Amateur Boxer

slides.content:
“I have been working with Jay and the team for almost 5 years and the experience has completely transformed my life; personally, professionally, cognitively and spiritually.
Through one-on-one coaching, my day to day existence and experience in life at work (in High Performance professional sport) and play has had a profound uplift. The way I communicate with myself and others as well as how I make sense of the world around me has never been more effective and authentic. Whilst I know I have so much further growth in my journey; what I have learnt so far has released incredible joy.
Jay and the team are inspiring, challenging, fun, effective and absolute masters of their craft."
slides.name: Patrick Harding
slides.title: Performance Coach for Alex Albon, Williams Formula 1

settings.title:
Championship Case Study:
Fiji Rugby 7s Olympic Gold

settings.editor: Defending Olympic champions Fiji Rugby 7s facing unprecedented pressure, with a new head coach, pandemic isolation from families, and the need to maintain mental strength and consistency for a back-to-back Games medal.

Weekly coaching sessions with head coach Gareth Baber on mindset and messaging. Training coaching staff in NLP and Integral Psychology, communication strategies, framing etc. Integrating mental, physical, and tactical training with cultural meaning. Sessions in camp with players, 1-1 sessions with players.
Married elite technical and tactical skills with comprehensive mental skills training. Created simple, powerful communication platforms that resonated with Fijian cultural and religious values.

Olympic Gold Tokyo 2021, Olympic Silver Paris 2024. Team demonstrated exceptional mental unity, clarity, and resilience under the highest pressure in world sport, winning 2 matches in a row between Oceania and Olympic campaigns.

settings.title: Ready to Unlock Your Championship Potential?

settings.editor: Join the elite athletes, teams, and coaches who trust Head Coach for the mental edge that makes the difference. Whether you're aiming for Olympic gold, professional success, or personal breakthrough, we'll help you train your mind for victory.
Start your journey with a personalized assessment of your mental performance needs and goals.
Work with Jay to create a customised mental skills training program using the proven Integral+™️ model.
Experience the mental edge that has helped athletes and teams reach the pinnacle of their sport.
The same mental coaching that helped Fiji Rugby 7s win Olympic gold is ready to elevate your performance. Don't leave your mental game to chance.

Transform the way you coach by mastering the mental side of the game. Across 12 live, online sessions, join Jay Hedley (HeadCoach) and Tarek Chouja (FTI) to learn the tools, frameworks, and coaching strategies used in high and elite performance environments, from international Rugby 7s to professional boxing and Formula motor racing.

High performance isn't just sets and reps. It's resilience under pressure, clarity of focus, and the confidence to execute when it counts. MST bridges the gap between physical preparation and mental mastery, so you can coach the whole athlete. Delivered by Jay Hedley (developmental psychology in elite environments) and Tarek Chouja (movement coaching systems), you'll get practical frameworks you can use immediately with yourself, your athletes and movement clients at every level.
 
This isn't theory, it's battle-tested methodology from international Rugby 7s at Olympic level, professional boxing, and Formula 1 motor sport. You'll learn the same tools used by world-class coaches to unlock peak performance when it matters most.
